thread.title_full: UN projects steady 3% GDP growth for Azerbaijan in 2025-2026 | Caliber.Az

title: UN projects steady 3% GDP growth for Azerbaijan in 2025-2026 | Caliber.Az
text:
[ECONOMICS](https://caliber.az/en/category/4)
UN projects steady 3% GDP growth for Azerbaijan in 2025-2026
The United Nations has forecasted an annual GDP growth rate of 3% for Azerbaijan in 2025.
This prediction, outlined in the UN’s recently published "World Economic Situation and Prospects 2025" report, highlights the positive trajectory of Azerbaijan's economy, [Caliber.Az](https://caliber.az/en) reports [via](https://report.az/ru/finansy/oon-srednegodovoj-rost-vvp-azerbajdzhana-v-2025-2026gg-sostavit-3/) local media.
"Economic growth in Azerbaijan accelerated in 2024, driven by stronger domestic demand and the expansion of the non-oil sector. The rising global demand for Azerbaijani natural gas is expected to sustain GDP growth in 2025," the report states.
The UN also projects a similar GDP growth rate of 3% for Azerbaijan in 2026.
The UN's estimates indicate that Azerbaijan’s GDP grew by 4.6% in 2024, following a modest 1.1% increase in 2023.
However, the Ministry of Economy of Azerbaijan forecasts a slightly higher GDP growth of 3.5% for 2025, with a decrease to 2.8% in 2026.
By Aghakazim Guliyev
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->financial and economic news
